favourite.article: Colors will fade, black hair turns to white, beautiful skin soon wrinkled, teeth becomes incomplete, eyes will lost its sight and life comes to an end. Everything has a turning point, an end point, and nothing will last except the eternal life of God. Saints! Let us learn how to number our days, treasuring and spending more time with the Lord, not to the world. Treasuring the Lord is our most valuable time on earth!

Lord teach us then to number our days, heart of wisdom to obtain and gain. Satisfy us, Lord in the morn with lovingkindness outpoured. That a joyful ringing shout may arise. All the days of our life. Lord, according to all the days that we affliction have faced, And to the years wherin evil we've seen. Make me glad in Thee.
The days are evil. Time is passing fast. We need to grab the opportunities.
May we be those who would treasure our time with the Lord! saints! lets all start treasuring our time with the Lord!
Yes Lord, teach us to number our days. Even more offering this solely to YOU.
Teach us to number our days!

All will truly fade and will fly away. Our years, our wealth, our possession, everything that we attained, all these things will surely come to an end. Lord, may You help us see Your Supreme Preciousness for us to be able to change our valuation. Yes Lord, we sometimes become blinded from the things that we have seen and to the things that we are attracted. Thank the Lord for this very refreshing hymn! Lord, may You teach us to number our days so that we may gain a heart of wisdom. Above all, You are very Precious from all the temporary things that we have seen. We love You Lord Jesus!

Our years may come to an end. All soon will fade and we too fly away. Teach us Lord to number our days. Saints lets not waste our time. lets use IT to enjoy our dear Lord JESUS. MAy our years be fully for Him for HIs economy. Make me willing JESUS MY LORD.
